name: sun-flute
effect: Evolves Nebby into Solgaleo when used at the Altar of the Sunne.
short_effect: Evolves Nebby into Solgaleo when used at the Altar of the Sunne.

flavor_text.sun-moon: It is said that the tones it produces were offered up as an expression of gratitude to the Legendary Pokémon of the sun.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: It is said that the tones it produces were offered up as an expression of gratitude to the Legendary Pokémon of the sun.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: It is said that the tones it produces were offered up as an expression of gratitude to the Legendary Pokémon of the sun.
